availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Adams. Father of Sully Adams, David Adams, Squire Adams, Margaret Ann Adams, and Joanna Adams. Farmer in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Henry County in 1850. Farmer in Henry County in 1860. Owned three enslaved persons in Henry County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 404B-405A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 614.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 1, p. 408.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 189B.
